activities: Tableau Software, Inc. processes EEA personal data relating to (1) employees of Tableau Software, Inc.'s subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland for purposes of global HR administration and management; and (2) individual actual and prospective customers, and individual representatives of actual and prospective corporation customers, distributors, suppliers and other business partners in the EEA, for purposes of invoicing, communicating and administering the business relationship with such corporate business partners.  Also, Tableau Software, Inc. hosts and processes EEA personal data relating to its customers on its customers' behalf and subjected to its customers' instructions as a data processor.
corpofftitle1: VP, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, Off-line, HR data and customer data.  Mannually processed data is covered.
recoursemech: EEA Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Data Protection and Information Commissioner
